# [Interview #605: Driving Mr. Sanderson - Terez, Entry #16](https://www.theoryland.com/intvmain.php?i=605#16)

#### Terez

Will we ever learn what went wrong when Narishma went to fetch
*Callandor*
?

#### Brandon Sanderson

Um...perhaps. (Terez laughs.) Was that one of yours?

#### Terez

Yes, that was.

#### Brandon Sanderson

I didn’t answer it, but I didn’t RAFO it.

#### Terez

Yeah. It’s all good.
